bill_title: provide that certain persons be given a preference for certain big game licenses.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide that certain persons be given a preference for certain big game licenses. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 41-6 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The Game, Fish and Parks Commission shall establish a point preference for any person, who is seventy years of age or older and who is South Dakota resident, in any drawing for a deer license or a turkey license conducted pursuant to this chapter if the person has been unsuccessful in a previous drawing for a deer license or a turkey license. The preference given pursuant to this section shall be double the point preference given to any person who does not meet the criteria of this section. If a person is successful in any such drawing, the preference provided pursuant to this section does not apply to that person in any future drawing. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
